skills.title: Quantitative Analysis & Financial Engineering
skills.description: Specialist in financial engineering with proven track record of optimizing trading strategies and financial models using advanced quantitative methods

skills.title: Machine Learning & Data Science
skills.description: Skilled in machine learning and data science, applying Python, R, and AI tools to develop predictive models and analytics solutions across various sectors

skills.title: Programming & Software Development
skills.description: Proficient software developer specializing in Python for financial technologies, focusing on algorithm development and high-frequency trading systems

skills.title: Statistical Modeling & Optimization
skills.description: Experienced in statistical modeling and optimization, leveraging deep knowledge in statistics and analytics to drive decision-making and improve operational efficiencies

portfolio.title: 2023 WorldQuant IQC
portfolio.description: Won 1st place in the natinal finals of the International Quant Championship by quantitative analysis and alpha research

portfolio.title: XAI for Stock Prediction
portfolio.description: Mainly focused on the return prediction of selected stocks and try to improve model accuracy. Then used XAI tools and techniques to analyze the reliability of the model and built explainability features to explain model predictions by visualization

portfolio.title: Emotion Detection
portfolio.description: Supported by the Royal Bank of Canada, developed an emotion detection model to aid in early diagnosis and analysis of mental health issues, utilizing a ResNet-18 deep learning framework on the FER2013 dataset
